channel.title: Huntress on XeroExecute Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Huntress on XeroExecute Blog

item.title: Rust Tickler 3 - Huntress CTF 2025 Reverse Engineering Writeup
item.author: sir_xxxx@protonmail.com (XeroExecute Blog)
item.description: Complete walkthrough of Rust Tickler 3, a multi-stage Rust reverse engineering challenge from Huntress CTF 2025. Covers dynamic analysis, memory extraction, custom PRNG XOR cipher, and AES-256-CBC decryption techniques.

item.title: No Limits - Huntress CTF 2025 PWN Challenge Writeup
item.author: sir_xxxx@protonmail.com (XeroExecute Blog)
item.description: Complete writeup for “No Limits” PWN challenge from Huntress CTF 2025. Exploit a parent-child process architecture to bypass seccomp restrictions using /proc/pid/mem and GOT hijacking techniques.

item.title: Huntress 2024
item.author: sir_xxxx@protonmail.com (XeroExecute Blog)
item.description: My notes on five challenges from Huntress CTF 2024: Whamazon, Keyboard Junkie, MOVEable, Strange Calc and OceanLocust. The challenges were solved as part of the Dombusters team.
